findings.title: Unprotected Admin Functions
findings.description: Active smart contract owner has elevated privileges, which constitutes an impact on smart contract safety and security.

findings.title: Blacklist Functionality
findings.description: Smart contract owner can blacklist certain wallets from interacting with the contract function modules.

findings.title: Lock/Unlock Function Modules
findings.description: Smart contract owner can lock or unlock the smart contract function modules.

findings.title: Change Trading Status
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change the trading status, which can be used to stop users from buying or selling assets.

findings.title: Arbitrary Transaction Fees
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change transaction fees without any arbitrary limit set.

findings.title: Max Transaction and Wallet Limit
findings.description: Smart contract owner can change max transaction and wallet limits, which includes setting the value to 'zero' with no arbitrary limit set.
findings.location: Max Transaction and Wallet Limit Function Modules
